description.p: Physics-based rolling of customizable sets of dice. Use it as a standalone application or integrate it into your own Godot game as an add-on.

ul.li: Fully customizable: shape, color, face engravings, material, box color...
Available dice shapes: d4, d6, d8, d10, d10x10, d12, d20, poker dices.
Three rolling modes: Physics based, quick and external, for network games.
Straight forward integration as addon in your own Godot game.

caption.p: A dice set with all available shapes: d4, d6, d8, d10, d10x10, d12, d20 and poker
Save dicesets as presets to load later
Diceset Editor: Add and remove dices. Choose their shape, color and name.
Default dice set: Purple d6, yellow d10 and red d8.
A dice set to play dice poker
